about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Get to know a bit about my journey and skills
about.role: Full Stack Developer with Front-end focus
about.description: Full Stack Developer with Front-end focus, great programming enthusiast since age 15. Graduated in Systems Analysis and Development from Centro Universitário Senac Santo Amaro and technical degree in Industrial Automation. Currently working as Development Analyst at ST IT Cloud, focusing on UX Design and Front-end Web solutions. I'm a good-humored person, willing to solve challenges and always seeking new experiences and learning.

experienceItems.analystDescription: Analysis, Design, Development, Testing and Maintenance of web systems focused on React applications. Specialization in UX Design and Front-end Web solutions.
experienceItems.systemsDescription: Bachelor's degree in Systems Analysis and Development focused on web development, programming logic and graphical interface construction.
experienceItems.automationDescription: Technical training in Industrial Automation, where I deepened my knowledge in technology and developed IoT projects, including the creation of a "Laser Harp".
